title: new​
content: </> DiscordMessageBuilder.new() → DiscordMessageBuilder-- Returns the DiscordMessageBuilder instance. Creates a new DiscordMessageBuilder instance.

title: setContent​
content: </> DiscordMessageBuilder:setContent( Content: string-- The message content to set. ) → DiscordMessageBuilder-- Returns the instance for method chaining. Sets the content for the Discord message.

title: addEmbed​
content: </> DiscordMessageBuilder:addEmbed() → DiscordEmbed-- Returns a new DiscordEmbed instance to configure the embed. Adds an embed to the Discord message.

title: build​
content: </> DiscordMessageBuilder:build() → string-- The JSON-encoded string of the message. Builds the Discord message and converts it to a JSON string for sending.

title: new​
content: </> DiscordEmbed.new() → class Creates a new discord embed class

title: setTitle​
content: </> DiscordEmbed:setTitle( title: string-- Title of the embed ) → DiscordEmbed Sets the embed title

title: setDescription​
content: </> DiscordEmbed:setDescription( description: string-- Description text ) → DiscordEmbed Sets the embed description

title: setURL​
content: </> DiscordEmbed:setURL( url: string-- URL to be attached to the embed title ) → DiscordEmbed Sets the embed URL

title: setColor​
content: </> DiscordEmbed:setColor( hexColor: string-- Hexadecimal color (as a string) ) → DiscordEmbed Sets the embed color

title: setAuthor​
content: </> DiscordEmbed:setAuthor( name: string,-- Name of the author icon_url: string,-- (Optional) URL for the author icon url: string-- (Optional) URL for the author link ) → DiscordEmbed Sets the embed author

title: setFooter​
content: </> DiscordEmbed:setFooter( text: string,-- Footer text icon_url: string-- (Optional) URL for the footer icon ) → DiscordEmbed Sets the embed footer

title: setThumbnail​
content: </> DiscordEmbed:setThumbnail( url: string-- URL of the thumbnail image ) → DiscordEmbed Sets the embed thumbnail

title: setImage​
content: </> DiscordEmbed:setImage( url: string-- URL of the image ) → DiscordEmbed Sets the embed image

title: addField​
content: </> DiscordEmbed:addField( name: string,-- Name of the field value: string,-- Value of the field inline: boolean-- Whether the field is inline (default is false) ) → DiscordEmbed Adds a field to the embed

title: setTimestamp​
content: </> DiscordEmbed:setTimestamp( timestamp: string-- ISO 8601 timestamp (optional, defaults to current UTC time) ) → DiscordEmbed Sets the embed timestamp

title: build​
content: </> DiscordEmbed:build() → table-- Returns the embed data as a table Builds the embed data for sending in a Discord message
